properties.name: Contrast ADR - DLP SQL Injection Correlation
properties.description: 'Detects successful SQL injection attacks identified by Contrast ADR and correlates them with WAF/DLP logs. This rule identifies critical database security breaches that have bypassed initial defenses and may result in data exfiltration or unauthorized database access.'

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Confirmed active SQL Injection by Contrast ADR on {{request_headers_referer_s}}  endpoint of {{application_name_s}}
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Confirmed active SQL Injection by Contrast ADR on {{request_headers_referer_s}}  endpoint of {{application_name_s}}
